mapper.select: select bno, subject, teacher, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, show, (select count(*) from kdemyreview_reply where bno=b.bno) cnt from kdemyreview b where show='Y' order by bno desc

select bno, subject, teacher, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt, show, (select count(*) from kdemyreview_reply where bno=b.bno) cnt from kdemyreview b
where show='Y' and (title like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} )
order by bno desc

select count(*) from kdemyreview b
where show='Y' and (title like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} )
mapper.insert: insert into kdemyreview_attach (fullName, bno) values ( #{fullName}, seq_kdemyreview.currval )
mapper.update: update kdemyreview set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.delete: update kdemyreview set show='N' where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select rno,bno,replyer,regdate,updatedate,username,r.replytext from kdemyreview_reply r, kdemymember m where r.replyer=m.userid and bno=#{bno} order by rno
